title: Do you start this program before you go to court for reaffirmation?
question: I have already been to bankruptcy court on June 3rd and now I go back court on June 26th for reaffirmation.
answers: To what program do you refer? The 2nd financial counseling program? If yes, you must complete that counseling and file your certificate with the court within 45 days of your final Meeting of Creditors. Ditto if you filed your case jointly with your spouse.
